title: Seattle: Pioneering plastic straw ban is effective and popular - PIRG
body: September 3, 2021 Disposable plastic straws are small enough to be a nuisance and big enough to be a problem. Alex Truelove Guest post by Clay Napurano Cities and states around the country have taken steps to ban certain single-use plastics — straws, plastic bags, polystyrene take-out containers and more.
